settings.icon_text:
Log into or create your
Afterpay account, with
instant approval decision

Your purchase will be
split into 4 payments,
payable every 2 weeks

settings.afterpay_subheading:
Get what you want today, pay it in
four instalments, always interest-free.

settings.afterpay_footer_heading_left:
All you need to apply is to have a debit or credit card, to 
be over 18 years of age, and to be a resident of Australia.
settings.afterpay_footer_heading_right: Late fees and additional eligibility criteria apply. The first payment may be due at the time of purchase. For complete terms visit afterpay.com/en-AU/terms
